game.title: game title
game.synopsis: The hero was stranded on an unknown planet. They must survive and find a way to get off this world.
game.beginning: The hero was running from planet to planet attempting to find a vessel to get them back to [their home planet], which was destroyed in an attack.  They realized that they must reach the core of the galaxy, and find the spaceship that they are seeking, but they never realized that it would be difficult to reach.
game.ending: They finally found a ship, but it was under attack from pirates. The hero had not given up, they had found a way to survive, and to escape from the pirates, which would lead to the discovery that their home planet is still in ruin, but the hero realizes that they still have what they need to rebuild it.
